name: Project 2 - Cake Crafter 3000
description:
This application is for an IT201 assignment at NJIT.

This application acts as a cake crafting simulator. By clicking the “Generate Recipe” button, a random cake recipe will generate. Next, the user will add cake ingredients to match the recipe by clicking on each respective ingredient button in the craft panel. After ingredients are added, clicking the “Bake” button will send the cake to the oven, where an oven timer will begin to countdown. The user will earn money and receive critic feedback depending on if the cake was good or not. The oven can also be upgraded by taking one second off overall bake rates for $100. 

By: Jordan London
